rows.label: qev065401_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there. How's work?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Sorry to bug you when you're busy, but do you think
you could help me out with a teeeeensy favor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's actually a really juicy offer—has to do with you,
me, and my man Clemons here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_JNK0010
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev065401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ignore Lara Nara, sensing nothing but disaster ahead.

rows.label: qev065401_JNK0020
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: qev065401_SEL0021
rows.name: Hear Lara Nara out.

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0004
rows.name: What? Oh, no no no! I think you have the wrong idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'll admit I could have maybe phrased things better.
That's my bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0006
rows.name:
What I have for you is a serious and profitable job.
You won't regret hearing me out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0007
rows.name:
Mmm, I thought you might be interested.
Hard to resist a pretty face like Clemons, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0008
rows.name:
You wouldn't believe what we got up to when we first
met![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Wait, why are you rolling your eyes?
You're not even a little bit curious? Sheesh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0010
rows.name:
How you're not curious about a catch like me is
simply mystifying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0011
rows.name: Well, there's no accounting for taste, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Aaaaanyway, the little job I mentioned actually comes
from Clemons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0013
rows.name: And since he found the intel, I'll let him do the briefing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0014
rows.name:
Hey there. Like he said, the name's Clemons.
So you know the Ganglion fortress north of the city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0015
rows.name:
I've got witnesses saying they've recently installed some
brand-new weapon there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0016
rows.name:
But the fact they're doing so in secret instead of making
it a show of force is worrisome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0017
rows.name:
That means it's not just a deterrent—they're planning to
use it, likely when they think we'll least expect it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0018
rows.name:
The good news is that they don't know we have this
intel yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0019
rows.name:
So we need to launch our own surprise attack before
they launch theirs, and now is our best chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0020
rows.name:
If we're lucky, we might take down their new weapon
and the whole fortress to boot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0021
rows.name:
But that's only if we act fast, which is why we need
your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0022
rows.name: ...Seeeeee? Totally legit business offer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0023
rows.name:
We've already sent in an advance team—they should
be working on suppressing the hold's defenses now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0024
rows.name:
You would be playing escort to a science team we're
sending in to analyze whatever this weapon of theirs is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Ha! There, see? Easy as pie. So get all your little
duckies in a row, because you're shipping out ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0026
rows.name: ...What? Wait, say again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0027
rows.name: ...Hold on, is that confirmed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0028
rows.name: ...Oh my gosh, that is AWFUL![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0029
rows.name: Situation's changed, kiddos![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Our advance team ran into more resistance than we
expected and got pretty much...er...wiped out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0031
rows.name:
The science team is officially canceled. Now I want you
to go in there and get whatever's left of the advance
team out, pronto![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0032
rows.name:
I know this little job's taken a real turn for the grim,
but you're still in, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0033
rows.name:
Clemons and I need to focus on information gathering,
so you get out there as soon as you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0034
rows.name: We're counting on you. Ta-ta![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0035
rows.name: I don't think the advance team just got careless...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0036
rows.name: Something came up. Something none of us expected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0037
rows.name:
So make sure YOU go in there expecting anything
and everything. Got it? Good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Our team is still pinned down at the fortress north of
the city. Good luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0039
rows.name: Welcome back, [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]! Nice work out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0040
rows.name: That BLADE you saved beat you back here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0041
rows.name:
It tears me up that he's the only one who made it
home, but at least he's doing well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0042
rows.name:
As for the operation at the north fortress,
it seems we all got played for saps.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0043
rows.name:
Clemons sold us out to the Ganglion! His fake intel
sent our advance team straight into an ambush.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0044
rows.name:
He's being "questioned" by his CO as we speak.
...And yes, those are total air quotes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0045
rows.name: I never would have taken Clemons for a traitor...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0046
rows.name: Hmmmm? Was that Suriella just now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0047
rows.name: You know her, right? New LA's own "town helper"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Helping people out is sort of her... Well, hobby.
And since we can always use the help,
we give her PLENTY of opportunities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0049
rows.name:
Kind of feels like we're taking advantage of her
sometimes, but she doesn't seem to mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0050
rows.name: Wonder what's got her in such a hurry, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0051
rows.name: Did you see anybody pass by here?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0052
rows.name:
Mmm-hmm. Suriella tore through like a bat outta heck.
...Oh, look! She's right behind you!

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0053
rows.name:
That is SO weird. I must not have seen you when you
doubled back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0054
rows.name: I didn't double back! The person you saw wasn't me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0055
rows.name: It's some alien POSING as me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0056
rows.name: What? ...Wait, WHAT?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0057
rows.name:
That mess at the Ganglion fortress with the fake intel
was them, too. It's a Definian! They can change shape![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0058
rows.name:
I was interrogating Clemons when... Well, I THOUGHT
I was interrogating Clemons, but then that Definian
showed her true form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0059
rows.name: Now she's posing as Suriella and trying to get away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0060
rows.name: So the Clemons that betrayed us was a...fake?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0061
rows.name:
You got it. New LA's under lockdown right now—
we've got BLADEs in Skells at all the exits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0062
rows.name: It's physically impossible for her to get out through that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0063
rows.name:
So now it's our job to find her.
And honestly, we could use some help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0064
rows.name: A shape-shifter, huh? Talk about a pain in the glutes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0065
rows.name: If there's anything I can do to help, please tell me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0066
rows.name: You can stay put right here, honey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0067
rows.name: But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0068
rows.name:
Girl, that thing is impersonating you! If you go
wandering around, you'll only be in the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0069
rows.name: So leave this one to us, okay? We've got this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0070
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0071
rows.name: All right. We've got a Definian to catch![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0072
rows.name:
We know that sneaky snake is somewhere in the city,
and that she was last seen looking like Suriella.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0073
rows.name:
I'll start out in the administrative district.
You take a look in the commercial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0074
rows.name: What a pain in the rear, I swear...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0075
rows.name:
I'll bet the little punk that played us is laughing her
head off right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0076
rows.name: I swear, once I find her, she is gonna HURT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065401_MSG0077
rows.name:
Come on. We've got a shape-shifter to catch.
She's probably still impersonating Suriella.[ST:wait ]
